Can I shop at your business without a membership?

Jesse- Though we don't have day passes, when you visit a Costco warehouse you'll discover all the valuable savings we have to offer. As a nonmember, you may still purchase prescriptions from a Costco pharmacy with cash, debit, Costco Shop Cards or a Visa® card. However, you must be a paid member to enter the warehouse and purchase any other items. To sign up, simply stop by the membership counter at any Costco warehouse or you may sign up online as well. We take great pride in the quality and savings we offer our members.
